name: Another World (itch) (Taylormc666)
description:
This game is a first person shooter with multiple free running mechanics such as wall running, wall climbing, etc. the game has 2 levels a main level and a short tutorial.

This game was created as a game design project by me at Priestley College.

Press ESC or P to pause

SHIFT to sprint

CTRL to crouch

Use CTRL while sprinting to slide
